title: Provide a Material Safety Data Sheet (MSDS)
description: A retailer needs the MSDS for a chemical product they purchase.

tasks.description: Receive the request from the retailer for the MSDS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the product in question.

tasks.description: Retrieve the MSDS document from the compliance database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct MSDS PDF.

tasks.description: Send the MSDS to the retailer.
